Text: Manifest ErrorBruce Ferrel the designated system administrator for Enron is no longer with your company I am addressing this issue to you We obviously need to change the administrator of the system as soon as possible In addition I have sent over the new appendixs we spoke about yesterday to your attention Today we had a situation where Dick Jenkins Enron employeehit a flat GDD bid at Transco Z for Dec He actually was logged in under Scott Hendricksons ID Soon after the trade occurred Mr Jenkins called and informed me that he had made a mistake and that he wanted the deal cancelled I informed him of the Manifest Error penalty associated with that step By the way the penalty associated with a manifest is Mr Jenkins informed me that he wanted the trade cancelled but would not pay the fee The Amendment to the Subscription Agreement dated June describes the Manifest Error process and all fees associated with it Altra enforces this language on all subscribers to the system in order to ensure the integrity of our trading platform If you have any questions please call me at Sincerely Scott Coleman
